POINT72 ASSET MANAGEMENT, L.P.

Description: Point72 Asset Management, L.P., is an American hedge fund. SAC Capital Advisors was founded in 1992 and converted its investment operations to the Point72 Asset Management family office in 2014. In 2018, the firm reopened to external investors after a two-year ban and began accepting outside capital. As of 2019, Point72 employs approximately 1,400 people. Point72 has its main office in Stamford, Connecticut, and there are several satellite offices around the world.
